speaker.whotheyare: Molly Wright, a student from Queensland, Australia, is a passionate advocate for early childhood development. At just seven years old, she's one of the youngest people ever to give a TED Talk.
speaker.whylisten: Molly Wright is a Grade 2 student from Queensland, Australia. She's an aspiring wildlife warrior, performer and budding social activist. With the help of her parents, she runs Molly's Wildlife Warriors: a group of 40 children who raise awareness and funds for Currumbin Wildlife Hospital Foundation in Queensland, Australia. She's a proud big sister to Freddie (human) and Matilda (Dalmatian puppy).
